summary: Provides a CardDatastore class that abstracts the storage and retrieval of Metaflow UI card objects and their data, handling path construction, local caching, and read/write operations across multiple backends such as local filesystem, S3, Azure Blob, and Google Cloud Storage.
business_intent: Ensures that visualisation cards generated by Metaflow workflows are persisted reliably and can be accessed from various storage services, supporting consistent user experiences and downstream analysis.
